akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 95–561, title XV, § 1529, Nov. 1, 1978, 92 Stat. 2380

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1921. Repealed. Pub. L. 95–561, title XV, § 1529, Nov. 1, 1978, 92 Stat. 2380
Section, Pub. L. 93–380, title VII, § 705, Aug. 21, 1974, 88 Stat. 589; Pub. L. 94–194, §§ 1(a), (b)(3), 2, 3, Dec. 31, 1975, 89 Stat. 1103, 1104, set forth requirements for agreements for reading deficiencies projects with State and local educational agencies.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1978, see section 1530(a) of Pub. L. 95–561, set out as an Effective Date of 1978 Amendment note under section 1221e–3 of this title.
